items.title: 'That's what we sign up for': Five tales -- and a few gripes -- from playing on Christmas
items.description: With NBA Christmas games on the horizon, stars and coaches share their stories and gripes about playing on the holiday.

items.title: Commanders to start QB Johnson vs. Cowboys
items.description: The Commanders will start 39-year-old Josh Johnson at quarterback for their Christmas Day home game against the Cowboys, coach Dan Quinn announced Wed...

items.title: Washington WR Boston says he's entering draft
items.description: Washington junior wide receiver Denzel Boston announced Wednesday that he's declaring for the NFL draft.

items.title: FSU's Castellanos drops appeal, enters NFL draft
items.description: Florida State quarterback Thomas Castellanos has dropped his appeal for another year of college eligibility and declared for the NFL draft.

items.title: Jacksonville State RB Cook plans to enter portal
items.description: Jacksonville State star running back Cam Cook plans to enter the NCAA transfer portal, he announced Wednesday.
